fields.description:
We are running ActiveMQ ver 5.2 server, all the clients are using Activemq 4.1.1to connect to the same server.
It works fine for sometime but after that if we restart the activmq server we see the following error. As it works some time and doesnt work few times we are not sure if we have to change the client API to Activemq 5.2. Any comment on this will be helpful.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

fields.environment: linux 32 bit -2.6.18-92.el5 i686 i686 i386 GNU/Linux-, jre1.6.0_10

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Client using 41 API and Server is running on 5.2
